name: harmony pig
notes:
**size**
one size

**measurements**
height: approx. 22 cm / 8.6”

**materials**
pica pau cotton 8/7 nude
2 skeins of color 09
1 skein of color 01

pica pau cotton 8/7
1 skein of color 08
1 skein of color 22
1 skein of color 27
1 skein of color 28
1 skein of color 32
1 skein of color 37

crochet hook 2.75 mm / us c2
2 safety eyes 8 mm
stuffing
tapestry needle
stitch marker

**yarn quality**
pica pau cotton 8/7 nude, hobbii
100% cotton
50 g (1.75 oz) = 90 m (98 yds)

pica pau cotton 8/7, hobbii
100% cotton
50 g (1.75 oz) = 90 m (98 yds)

**pattern information**
harmony pig is an intermediate project, worked in a continuous spiral. to keep track of the rounds you may use a stitch marker or safety pin to mark the beginning of a round.
the head and the body are worked in a single piece. harmony pig also has 2 accessories: a hat and a skirt.

remember that it’s always advisable to give the entire pattern a read before starting crocheting and, most importantly, be patient with yourself!
